TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Reusable Lookup to fetch Revenue category as well as Matrix Description for a Infinium GL Code
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_MATCH_MATRIXCODEMASTER

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.MATRIX_DESC as MATRIX_DESC, A.REVENUE_CTGRY as REVENUE_CTGRY, A.MATRIX_CD as MATRIX_CD FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_MATRIXCODEMASTER A WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This Mapping will load all the contract promotion data to CPPH_HIST table for all the Month to Month Contract data.
MAPPING.NAME: m_STG_TO_HOPM_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_LOAD_MONTHLY_PROMOTION

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST for the Month to Month contract data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_USI) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_SEQUENCE)
--TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(i_CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(i_USI)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_KEY)
--TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Promotion that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper for Month to Month contract data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY, A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, C.PROF_MAP_CD, D.ACTIVITY_FLAG, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.CYCLE_END, F.BILL_DATE, E.BILLING_CYCLE, (C.DPI_ENVRN || '|' || C.TARIF_CD || '|' || C.SVC_TYPE || '|' || C.PRD_CD) as CPPH_PRODUCT_PART_CODE, A.USI, A.CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID, A.PROMO_KEY, C.REDMPT_PCT, C.CORE_PRD, A.PROMO_ID, A.PROMO_SEQUENCE
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT CYCLE_BEGIN, CYCLE_END, BILL_DATE, ENVIRONMENT, BILLING_CYCLE, ETL_CYCLE_ID FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID) F
INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND F.BILLING_CYCLE = E.BILLING_CYCLE --F.ID = E.BILL_CYCLE_ID AND
INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND D.END_DATE < F.BILL_DATE AND D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY
INNER JOIN (SELECT DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY, QUALIFYING_PRODUCT, START_DATE, END_DATE, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, INFINIUM_GL_CODE, USI, CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID, PROMO_KEY, PROMO_ID, PROMO_SEQUENCE, DPI_ENVIRONMENT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION WHERE CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND ETL_CYCLE_ID <> $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND ETL_CYCLE_ID >0 AND ACTIVITY_FLAG <> 'O' AND NVL(DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,0)!=0) A ON A.DPI_ENVIRONMENT = F.ENVIRONMENT AND A.END_DATE > F.BILL_DATE AND A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY
--INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT B --ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = B.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY --AND A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY = B.PRD_CATLG_KEY
INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG C ON A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND F.BILL_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE
--ON B.PRD_CATLG_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY --AND A.START_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE
--WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' --AND A.ETL_CYCLE_ID <> $$ETL_CYCLE_ID --AND A.ACTIVITY_FLAG <> 'O' --AND NVL(A.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,0)!=0

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the INFINIUM_GL_CODE for the Matric code lookup
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This target is populated with Contract Assembly information coming in from all the Contract Map tables in Staging Layer for Month to Month contract data.
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: DELETE FROM $$RHOP_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST WHERE DELTA_OR_MONTHLY = 'MONTHLY' AND STG_TABLE_NAME = 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' AND ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID; COMMIT;

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST for the Month to Month contract data.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the INFINIUM_GL_CODE for the Matric code lookup
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Promotion that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper for Month to Month contract data.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Source Defintion for Staging Table for Contract Promotion
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the value for the Active Flag for the Current_Flag
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RECORD_ACTV_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the ETL Cycle User Id
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ETL_CYCLE_ID

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the schema name for the Staging Tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$STG_SCHEMA

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the schema name for the Hopper Mirror Tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RHOP_SCHEMA

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Source Defintion for Staging Table for Contract Promotion
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Target Defintion for Hopper Mirror Table for Contract Product Part Hopper
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Reusable Lookup to fetch Revenue category as well as Matrix Description for a Infinium GL Code
